(1) To include all costs of art work, printing and stenographic bureau
services for publications from this headquarters (including News-letter)
not Including committee and research reports which should be charged to
expense of committees (see below).
(2) For printing costs for reports growing out of meetings and research.
This year a great deal of expense was incurred by headquarters (and
charged to supplies and expenses) when they should more properly
have been charged to committee expenses. Otherwise, headquarters
expenses are net shown in their true light.
